meanings.definition: Resembling a frog in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The pond was full of froggier creatures hopping around.
meanings.sent2: The girl wore a froggier costume for the school play.
meanings.sent3: The froggier puppet made the children giggle during the show.
meanings.sent4: Her green hat made her look even froggier than usual.
meanings.sent5: The froggier mask was so realistic, it startled the cat.

meanings.sent1: The new pond was even froggier than the old one.
meanings.sent2: The froggier lily pads provided more shade for the fish.
meanings.sent3: The froggier sound of the waterfall was soothing to listen to.
meanings.sent4: His froggier voice croaked out the song lyrics.
meanings.sent5: The froggier smell of the swamp lingered in the air.

meanings.sent1: The froggier creature leaped into the water with a splash.
meanings.sent2: The froggier movements of the dancer captivated the audience.
meanings.sent3: The froggier pattern on the fabric made it stand out in the store.
meanings.sent4: Her froggier features made her a perfect fit for the role.
meanings.sent5: The froggier texture of the skin felt cool to the touch.
